thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 4 night stay in Feb
thread.title_full: 4 night stay in Feb - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Will T
title: 4 night stay in Feb
text: We arrived at the hotel early (about 1:30) but the receptionist was very helpful and managed to find us a room to check into on the 21st floor. The room was very clean, spacious and had a large comfortable bed. There are coffee making facilities in the room which let you brew your own coffee, it was very nice. Our room was cleaned each day to high standards and all the members of staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good, the only negative would be the plastic plates and cutlery. I would definitely return to this hotel as it's location provides easy access to all of New York City.
